org.xlattice.protocol

Class TLV

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xlattice.protocol.TLV
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TLV16

    public abstract class TLV
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the classic Type-Length-Value field found in many network protocols. This is an experiment; the implementation may change drastically at a later date.
    Author:
    Jim Dixon

      • encode

        public int encode(byte[] message,
                  int offset)
        Write this TLV onto the message buffer at the offset indicated. XXX Assumes value.length == length
        Parameters:
        message - buffer to write TLV on
        offset - byte offset where we start writing
        Returns:
        offset after writing the values
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException, - NullPointerException
